title: Pixel 3 - Mobile data is not working
content: In last few days, I'm facing very slow mobile data issue on my GP3. I'm using AT&T Prepaid and verified and updated the APN but no luck. Usually I get around 7-8 Mbps mobile data speed but now i'm getting around 0.2 or 0.3 mbps. Anyone got similar issue and fixed? Please advise.
